//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "pole", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_NOCLIP", "ON" );

	loop ( -1 )
	{

		task ( "move" )
		{
			move ( $tag( "poleend", ORIGIN)$, 1000.000 );
		}

		dowait ( "move" );

		task ( "back" )
		{
			move ( $tag( "polestart", ORIGIN)$, 1.000 );
		}

		dowait ( "back" );
	}

}


affect ( "pole01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_NOCLIP", "ON" );

	loop ( -1 )
	{

		task ( "move01" )
		{
			move ( $tag( "poleend01", ORIGIN)$, 1000.000 );
		}

		dowait ( "move01" );

		task ( "back01" )
		{
			move ( $tag( "polestart01", ORIGIN)$, 1.000 );
		}

		dowait ( "back01" );
	}

}


affect ( "tree01", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	loop ( -1 )
	{
		move ( $tag( "treeend01", ORIGIN)$, 1200.000 );
		wait ( 1200.000 );
		move ( $tag( "treestart01", ORIGIN)$, 1.000 );
		wait ( $random( 500, 1000 )$ );
	}

}


affect ( "tree01a", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	loop ( -1 )

		move ( $tag( "treeend01", ORIGIN)$, 1200.000 );
		wait ( 1200.000 );
		move ( $tag( "treestart01", ORIGIN)$, 1.000 );
		wait ( $random( 500, 1000 )$ );
	}

}
